title: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: When retrieving datetime values from a table, they are displayed in different formats in dynamic text items and data/text items.
EB: The datetime values should be displayed in the same format in both dynamic text items and data/text items.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Insert a text, data, and dynamic text item.
2. Retrieve datetime values from a table and display them in the text, data, and dynamic text items.
3. Compare the format of the datetime values displayed in the dynamic text item and data/text item.
